db:abstract.db:para: Using the CoAP client for a multicast resource discovery with a Qt Quick user interface.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml quick coap
CONFIG += qmltypes QML_IMPORT_NAME = CoapClientModule QML_IMPORT_MAJOR_VERSION = 1
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ qmlcoapmulticastclient.cpp
HEADERS += \ qmlcoapmulticastclient.h
qml_resources.files = \ qmldir \ Main.qml
qml_resources.prefix = /qt/qml/CoapClientModule
RESOURCES += qml_resources
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/coap/quickmulticastclient INSTALLS += target
